question.xref: DES s6, HC p109, KYTS p13
question.text: Which sign means that pedestrians may be walking along the road?

explanation.text: When you pass pedestrians in the road, leave plenty of room. You might have to use the right-hand side of the road, so look well ahead, as well as in your mirrors, before pulling out. Take great care if there is a bend in the road obscuring your view ahead.
